title: Slayer
description: From Wall Street Journal and USA Today Bestselling author Winter Travers comes the 8th installment in the Fallen Lords MC series.  An unexpected guest on the steps of the clubhouse turns Slayer's world upside down. Scrambling to make sense of everything and adjusting to a life he never expected has Slayer asking for help from the last person he thought could ever help him.  Wendy.  Can the feisty woman be the one to help him, or will she realize Slayer and the new woman in his life is too much to deal with?
author: Winter Travers
